name: More Money, Less Life
description:
Hi there!

This is our game for Blackthornprod's GameJam "Less is More". We implemented the topic in a Speed- Clicker with our idea: "Less money, more life".

Let us know your suggestions for improvement and ideas. The game can be downloaded for free, but you can support us through Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/fixustudios

Have fun with playing!
